items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: HabitHub is a Chrome Extension focused on helping users develop strong, consistent habits through a lightweight and gamified experience. The extension offers streak-based progression, habit unlocking mechanisms, and actionable reminders—all embedded seamlessly in the browser.
items.title: NehakumariRai/HabitHub-HackHazards: HabitHub is a Chrome Extension focused on helping users develop strong, consistent habits through a lightweight and gamified experience. The extension offers streak-based progression, habit unlocking mechanisms, and actionable reminders—all embedded seamlessly in the browser.
